WorkItem.Description: Hi, I would like to ask some questions ? I want to show value from db as a link in excel file. But when export, they print out value as a string . For example, I wanna show [ File](http://www.example.com) as a link like that..but shown below. File Could you pls show if there is any solutions?
WorkItem.Summary: show value as a link (href tag) in xlsx file

Comments.Message:
Read the documentation

[Change  a cell into a clickable link](https://github.com/PHPOffice/PHPExcel/blob/develop/Documentation/markdown/Overview/08-Recipes.md#change-a-cell-into-a-clickable-url)

And the issue log is for reporting bugs, not asking for help.... that's what the discussions tab is for
okie, thanks. Sorry for my mistake.
